name: Christmas Old Fashioned
instructions: In a mixing glass, combine bourbon, cinnamon syrup, and bitters. Add ice and stir. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with an orange peel twist.

name: Eggnog
instructions: Whisk eggs and sugar until smooth. Gradually stir in milk, heavy cream, and rum. Chill for at least 2 hours. Serve with a sprinkle of nutmeg on top.

name: Peppermint Martini
instructions: Combine vodka, peppermint schnapps, crème de menthe, and white chocolate liqueur in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with crushed candy canes.

name: Mulled Wine
instructions: In a pot, combine wine, orange slices, cinnamon sticks, cloves, star anise, and honey. Heat over medium heat until steaming, but not boiling. Add brandy and continue heating for 10 minutes. Serve warm.

name: Cranberry Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice and add vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, and ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with fresh cranberries and mint leaves.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
instructions: In a mug, combine butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Add dark rum and top with hot water. Stir until butter and sugar dissolve. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Gingerbread Martini
instructions: Shake vodka, gingerbread syrup, heavy cream, and Baileys Irish Cream with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with crushed gingerbread cookies.

name: Candy Cane Cocktail
instructions: Shake vodka, peppermint schnapps, and white chocolate liqueur with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with crushed candy canes.

name: Spiked Hot Chocolate
instructions: Pour whiskey into a mug. Top with hot chocolate and stir. Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Poinsettia Cocktail
instructions: In a champagne flute, combine Cointreau and cranberry juice. Top with champagne and garnish with fresh cranberries.

name: Snowball
instructions: Pour whisky and advocaat into a glass with ice. Top off with lemon soda and stir. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Cinnamon Apple Cider Punch
instructions: In a shaker, combine dark rum, apple cider, cinnamon syrup, and lemon juice with ice. Shake and strain into a glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Christmas Cosmo
instructions: Shake vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Winter Sangria
instructions: Combine red wine, brandy, orange juice, orange slices, apple slices, and cinnamon sticks in a large pitcher. Let sit in the fridge for at least 2 hours. Serve chilled.

name: Frosty the Snowman
instructions: Shake vanilla vodka, white chocolate liqueur, and cream with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with shaved coconut.
